features.title: Highly Customizable & Cost-effective Software
features.content: Our School ERP is highly customizable to fit your school’s unique needs & workflows also affordable compared to other ERP Software in India.

features.title: Scalable & Secure Servers
features.content: Campus Flow Education ERP Software works on scalable & secure servers, ensuring adaptability to the evolving needs of the school.

features.title: Cloud-based Application
features.content: Our School ERP is highly customizable to fit your school’s unique needs & workflows also affordable compared to other ERP Software in India.

features.title: 24/7 Customer Support
features.content: Campus Flow ERP provides continuous flexible support to schools, ensuring access to assistance around the clock.

products.title: Transport Management System
products.content: The transport management software helps students, parents, staff and management

products.title: Library Management System
products.content: The Library management software helps in operating library with an automated system.

products.title: Timetable Management
products.content: Teachers and administrators can generate and alter timetables using easily.

products.title: Accounting: Managing school fee System
products.content: This Software helps in managing student fee collection records.

products.title: Alert Management System
products.content: Alert management system Helps to keep track of ongoing tasks and their current status.

products.title: Visitor Management System
products.content: This system helps to create a appropriate visitor management record for school.

products.title: Parent – Teacher Interaction Module
products.content: School ERP software helps parents to get real-time access to their child's daily performance.

products.title: Attendance Management System
products.content: Attendance management system helps to to keep track of daily attendance in real-time.

products.title: Discipline management System
products.content: This module assist to monitor and maintain student discipline and run a school with a good and productive atmosphere.

products.title: Leave Management System
products.content: This software simplifies the process and status of leave, daily attendance record.

products.title: E-learning System: Virtual Classroom
products.content: This system helps to conduct real- time online web classes.

products.title: Transfer Certificate Generation System
products.content: It helps in easy, effortless and time saving generation of transfer certificate.

products.title: Online Admission Management System
products.content: It provides a secured login portal for students with one-time password protection (OTP) for admission.

products.title: Fees & Fine Management
products.content: This module streamlines school fee and fine management, simplifying payment processing and record-keeping.

products.title: Examination Management System and Report Card
products.content: The examination management system module assists in monitoring and managing examination activities.
